channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023090226
item.description:
Report X-2023090226

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: NORTHFIELD
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 5 GALLON BUCKET WRAPPED IN BLACK PLASTIC BAG AND CLEAR TAPE. PACKAGE FOUND IN TRAILER WHILE UNLOADING. DURING CLEAN UP RESPONDER DISCOVERED THE BUCKET UNDER THE PLASTIC WAS THE ORIGIONAL PACKAGING FROM THE MANUFACTURER AND HAD UN NUMBER AND CORROSICE 8 DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL ON IT. CONTACTED HAZMAT HELP DESK.
